parameters.name: Display
parameters.description: True to show the callout, false to hide it

title: ICallout.Display
description: Shows or hides the independent (i.e., not attached to a selection) callout.

parameters.name: Display
parameters.description: True to show the callout, false to hide it

returns: True if the operation is successful, false if not
